name: Clanging Scales
description: You slam your scaled hands together to create an intense, sound-based shockwave in a 30 foot cone in front of you. Any creature caught in the blast must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 3d6 + MOVE dragon damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by 5 or more reduce their AC by 1 for the remainder of combat.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
